choices.text:
### Human:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
### Assistant:

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to inform you that I have decided to leave my position at [Company Name]. My last day of work will be on [Date].

It has been a pleasure working for [Company Name] and I appreciate the opportunities and experiences I have gained during my time here. I am grateful for the support and guidance provided by both you and the rest of the team.

I would like to take this opportunity to thank everyone at [Company Name] for their hard work, dedication, and commitment to our shared goals. I wish all of you continued success in the future.

Please let me know if there is anything else I can do to assist with my transition out of the company or any other matters that need attention before my departure.

Thank you again for everything.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
